body:
Anyone wondering what the last page big reveal is after she takes off mask. I'll tell even though I only have 1st grader jap reading so bare with me...


It Says... "Desoo empire  Princess"  then... ekateria-da-so- doraitserun  Which I guess is her name... 

And if you remember from way back in vol 1 pg 6 ( if not go  look at it) It says that "DAMO ZO kingdom" where the prince is from had been struggling to hold on to it's independence from the larger "Desoo Empire" for 100 years///
 
Hence the princess trying to take over " the Desoo Empire" though corrupting the prince..

On that note a part 3 looks likely where kingdom... finally falls....
Can we get a summary for this chapter
Would gladly give away the country to evil, sexy and beautiful woman like them.
haha I forgot the story line
Damn, did he give up the other series? I've been waiting to see more of that develop, or maybe hes just done with it since hes done like 3 different works since the last one
